casebody.data:
WASCO LLC
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES, DIVISION OF WASTE MANAGEMENT No. 164P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. David Guidry, Attorney at Law, Mr. Adam G. Sowatzka, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, Mr. Cory Hohnbaum, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mr. Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for WASCO LLC. Mr. Daniel Hirschman, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Environment And Natural Resources, Division of Waste Management.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of May 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
